layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    RenderBody {BODY} at (0,0) size 800x600
      RenderBlock {DETAILS} at (0,0) size 800x16
        RenderBlock {SUMMARY} at (0,0) size 800x16
          RenderDetailsMarker {DIV} at (0,2) size 10.55x10.55: down
          RenderText {#text} at (16,0) size 73x16
            text run at (16,0) width 73: "summary 1"
        RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,16) size 800x0
caret: position 0 of child 0 {DIV} of {#document-fragment} of child 1 {SUMMARY} of child 1 {DETAILS} of body
